title: error en una cuenta de correo
content: hola, he usado por muchos años Thunderbird para administrar mis cuentas de correo pero ahora me esta mandando error en una de mi cuentas de correo "No se puede guardar el mensaje en el buzón de correo. Compruebe que tiene permiso de escritura en el directorio y suficiente espacio en disco para copiar el buzón de correo." ya cambie todos los correos de la bandeja de entrada, enviados y una carpeta "mensajes" a una carpeta en "carpetas locales" pero me sigue mandando este mensaje de error y no descarga los mensajes entrantes a la cuenta, ya se probo tambien el envio y si salen, me marca que tengo 31 mensajes en mi correo pero no se cargan y me manda el error de arriba antes de eliminar la cuenta y volverla a crear quiero tratar de solucionar el error por que no se si realmente la eliminacion y crear de nuevo la cuenta soluciona mi problema espero su respuesta
creator: eacevedop

title: Thunderbird can't access email account with a '@' in the password
content: I changed the password for one of my gmail accounts and now Thunderbird can't access it. It kept asking for verification. When I realized the problem I changed out the '@' but I can't change the password in Thunderbird. New emails are accessible in Gmail and Outlook but Thunderbird doesn't show then and nothing happens when I use 'get messages'. I need to delete the problem account to re-enter it, when I try to add the email address as a new account Thunderbird just says it already exists and does nothing.
creator: tom.loewen.sk

title: Thunderbird inbox
content:
Messages I sent from my iphone are showing up in my inbox marked with a gold star and looking like they came from the recipient, but they werent. Almost like a reminder of an email I sent? - I mistake them for new incoming messages. Why is this happening and how do I make it stop???

See the first two messages in the screen shot.

title: No Thunderbird e mail on i phone
content: For the past three months I have not received any e mails on my i phone from Thunderbird. I get them on my computer but not on my i phone. My provider is Shaw and I have been in touch with them but they said to contact you. I don't understand why I suddenly quit getting the e mails on my phone. I need to receive them as I need access to e mails on my phone soon, as I am out of town and have no computer where I spend the summer.
creator: lbhunt

title: Lost my "inbox"
content: My email was compromised and I deleted and reinstalled Thunderbird but now I can't find my inbox.

title: Performance tanking when using quick filter
content: Whenever i use quick filter to look for email. Thunderbird would tank and massively slow down. Is this common problem or is it just me. Sometimes the performance hit also bleed outside the app and slow the entire system.

Recently been migrated to the message co

title: Thunderbird will not connect to IMAP mail server except via VPN
content: Since yesterday, Thunderbird will not connect to my TalkTalk IMAP mail server unless I switch on a VPN. This is inconvenient. I have no problems accessing my emails through TalkTalk's online mail service, which doesn't happen when the server is down.

title: Zmiana domyślnego adresu poczty wychodzącej
content: Zmiana domyślnego adresu poczty wychodzącej nie jest skuteczna. Pomimo ustawienia innego konta, wysyłka domyślna i tak następuje z konta, które zostało jako pierwsze dodane do programu. Innymi słowy używając klawisza NAPISZ domyślnie w polu nadawcy pojawia się adres, którego nie chcę. W programie ustawiłem inne adres wysyłania, niż ten który się pojawia. Problem wg forum jest znany od przynajmniej roku 2019...

title: How to have original mails deleted from original inbox when deleting them from unified inbox
content:
How can I have the original mails deleted from original Gmail inbox when deleting them from unified inbox.

I am reading my mails in a unified inbox - and deleted some read and unwanted ones. Now I am looking at my Gmail via my iphone's mail app - and none of those emails have been deleted... How do I get those deletions to sync back to my Gmail account?


Thank a lot!
creator: yogev.w

title: 400 error after I changed a password
content:
Hi. I love Thunderbird! But I cannot use a Gmail account.

It all started when I changed the underlying password for my Gmail account (for routine security). I changed the password too on my Thunderbird client for SMTP and IMAP.

But then it popped up with: https://accounts.google.com/v3/signin/identifier?app_domain=http://localhost& [etc]

it keeps giving me this message:

"400. That’s an error. The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."

I've tried to read online what's going on. I've deleted the account and tried to set up again, and closed Thunderbird. It keeps doing this. I've checked Google settings ... nothing untoward. It doesn't have a link to Thunderbird still.

What can I do?

Thanks, Dan
creator: dan308

title: Formatting email signature
content:
Hi there,

I'm having some difficulty getting my email signature for my new job set up correctly.

I want the company logo to appear on the left, with my details to the right of the logo, as seen in the first screenshot.

However, currently, the text appears incorrectly underneath the company logo. I have tried pasting the signature into a blank email, generating the HTML code and pasting that into the signature text box, yet it still displays incorrectly when sending an email.

The HTML for my email signature is as follows:

<tr> 

 <td style="width:141.5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt" width="189"    valign="top"> 

 </td>  <td style="width:6.0cm;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt" width="227"    valign="top">

James Surname

Write + Rise = Wrise

 

Email: <a href="mailto:james@email.co.uk">james@email.co.uk</a>

Phone: 0161-533-0593

Website: wrise.co.uk

 </td>

</tr>

Any guidance you could provide me with would be gratefully received!

Many thanks, James
creator: adamantjhs

title: Issue with sending email  (5.7.1. rejected by policy issue)
content:
Good morning I have been using Thunderbird for a long time, but since 3 days again I can´t send any emails. I keep getting the same mistake:

"Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Rejected for policy reason. Please check the message and try again."

I have checked several times, & try to downgrade the version, but it is not working.

Please provide a solution, as I will be force to stop using your program anymore.

Awaiting your comments. Best Regards


Vicente Fresno
creator: vfvbitata

title: Since 4 days messages including in emails messages @akeonet.com (SFR company) can't be sent or received
content:
Hi, Since 4 days all emails messages ending by ".... @akeonet.com" (SFR company) can't be sent or received via THUNDERBIRD. When opening THUNDERBIRD a password is asked for address email "lalevee.claude@akeonet.com". But the current password doesn't work. I'am getting then a demand to "try again" or "enter a new password" or "cancel" but again without any success. However when trying "Configure your existing address email", I'am getting the message: the email address ("lalevee.claude@akeonet.com") is found in the FAI data base MOZILLA ! Using AKEO webmail, I can find new messages received or can send new ones. Please notice, adresses ending by "...@gmail.com" are not concerned by this problem, and still working !??? Stopping firewalls doesn't solve the issue.

Thank's for your help. Claude
creator: laleveeclaude
